text:
Thanks @Matt! I had a look and it seems you have to duplicate HS form to get all these fields. In the end, I had to create a template from scratch using this:

``` {% module "form" path="@HubSpot/form" %}```
In order to make it work and use all the fields in the editor

All the above that use {{ <http://module.form.XXX|module.form.XXX> }} will be created by the form field in a custom module, all the others are extra fields that have been added in the HS form module, you can duplicate most of those fields as they are generally just booleans or other fields that we have available to add in custom modules
